reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: Contributo a sostegno della Summer School 2022 di UNIDROIT in quanto mira alla formazione teorico-pratica di giuristi degli uffici legislativi di ministeri e magistrati provenienti da Paesi in via di Sviluppo.

The aims of the contribution is to support the UNIDROIT Summer School 2022. The Summer School will provide theoretical and practical training to jurists from the legislative offices of ministries and magistrates from developing countries.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
UNIDROIT - INTERNATIONAL INSTITUTE FOR THE UNIFICATION OF PRIVAT

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Broaden and strengthen the participation of developing countries in the institutions of global governance
By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
